Others: Jason Kidd blasted the Mavericks bench for failing to contribute in the game against the Phoenix Suns.
The Mavericks lost to the Suns by 1 point, 114-113.
Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving led the starters with 30 and 29 points respectively.
The Mavericks bench was outscored by the Suns' bench, 28-9.
